definition: disposition of troops/wave/spate/burst/spell/short period of time/classifier for events or states of short duration
to rain/(of rain, snow etc) to fall/to precipitate/to wet

sentences.english: The shower is over and the sun is breaking through the clouds.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨已過，太陽已從雲縫中照射出來了。

sentences.english: Intermittent showers pushed up water levels to record highs in two dams in Leizhou yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 間歇性陣雨推高水位紀錄高點在兩個水壩雷州昨天。

sentences.english: It looks like we're going to have a thundershower.
sentences.chinese: 看樣子我們會遇上雷陣雨的。

sentences.english: The granite pavement of the courtyard is wet because it rained last night.
sentences.chinese: 天井裏的青石板是溼漉漉的，因爲昨晚下了一陣雨。

sentences.english: We had a thunder shower yesterday.
It's showery today. Take an umbrella with you.
sentences.chinese: 今天有陣雨，帶上雨傘吧。

sentences.english: Jack's shoes were caked with mud in a country road after a demonstrateer.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨過後走在城市小路上，傑克的鞋子上沾了些泥塊。

sentences.english: WHEN storm clouds rumble in the sky and June showers come down.
sentences.chinese: 當雷雲在天上轟響，六月的陣雨落下的時候。

sentences.english: The truck kicked a cloud of dust up.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨滌盪了空中飛揚的灰塵。

sentences.english: The shower tailed off into a drizzle .
sentences.chinese: 陣雨越來越小，最後變成了毛毛雨。

sentences.english: Our walk in showers range have adjustable seats for you to sit on in the shower.
sentences.chinese: 我們的陣雨走在可調範圍爲您提供淋浴座位上坐了。

sentences.english: There will be occasional showers in southeast England, some of them perhaps heavy.
sentences.chinese: 英格蘭東南部有短時陣雨，部分地區會轉成大雨。

sentences.english: I hope there aren't going to be thunderstorms on Wednesday.
sentences.chinese: 我希望星期三沒有雷陣雨。

sentences.english: I feel in my heart like desert rain.
sentences.chinese: 很像久旱的沙漠，來了一陣雨。

sentences.english: Jack's shoes were caked with mud in a country road after a shower.
sentences.chinese: 陣雨過後走在鄉村小路上，傑克的鞋子上沾了些泥塊。

definition: a downpour/rain bucketing down/fig. to be overwhelmed (with work or things to study)
(of the sun) to scorch/to expose to a scorching sun
